pullrequest.title: Fix normal maps on ubuntu with OGRE 1.9 and disable on OSX

content.raw: the `enableNormalMap` variable is actually in `RTShaderSystem.cc`. The check here is for individual visual so if this fails for one visual we still want to keep normal map enabled in RTShaderSystem for other visuals. From what I observed, If tangent vectors fail to build, the mesh is still rendered but just appears as if no normal map is applied.
content.html: the enableNormalMap variable is actually in RTShaderSystem.cc. The check here is for individual visual so if this fails for one visual we still want to keep normal map enabled in RTShaderSystem for other visuals. From what I observed, If tangent vectors fail to build, the mesh is still rendered but just appears as if no normal map is applied.
